Actions.Name: Umbra
Actions.Effect: If made from stealth, this attack blinds the foe, is a critical hit (+[D]), and ignores cover.

Actions.Name: Dark Arts
Actions.Description: Swap places with an ally in range 2, teleporting.

Actions.Name: Nocturne
Actions.Description: Teleport 8, then gain stealth and evasion until the start of the shadow's next turn.
